short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to view all downloads in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can have quick access to your downloads in a simple popup. You can also search from your downloads without going to Chrome's downloads page.

Changelog: v1.2.0
* Fix the file name displayed in the UI in Windows.
